Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Permits funds collected from the Oswego county occupancy tax to be used on making tourism related capital improvements
Summary: Permits funds collected from the Oswego county occupancy tax to be used on making tourism related capital improvements; removes such tax on permanent residents.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to permitting funds collected from the Oswego county occupancy tax to be used on making tourism related capital improvements
